title: Learning Black-Box Attackers with Transferable Priors and Query Feedback

We further perform attack over defensive models to further demonstrate the query efficiency of our methods, including JPEG Compression [ref]18, Guided Denoiser [ref]29 and Adversarial Training [ref]25. Note that all results in this section are based on Inception-V3 . Official codes together with the defensive model weights are used.
